snippet: Owners of expensive homes on Southampton beaches are building barricades to hold back the ocean, although some say the barriers hasten erosion.
abstract: Owners of expensive homes on Southampton, NY, beaches are building barriers to hold back ocean in wake of Hurricane Sandy; situation is touching off bitter disputes over environment, real estate and class; some local officials worry that billionaire owners are engaging in arms race with nature, and that barricades could rapidly hasten erosion--essentially sacrificing public beaches to save private homes.
lead_paragraph: Owners of expensive homes on Southampton beaches are building barricades to hold back the ocean, although some say the barriers hasten erosion.

headline.seo: Southampton Homeowners Build Barricades to Hold Back Sea
headline.main: Dispute in Hamptons Set Off by Effort to Hold Back Ocean
headline.print_headline: Dispute in Hamptons Set Off By Effort to Hold Back Ocean
